definition: not processed or subjected to analysis, a dark oil consisting mainly of hydrocarbons
details:
adjective
- not processed or subjected to analysis
= synonyms: raw
- conspicuously and tastelessly indecent
= synonyms: gross, earthy, vulgar
- belonging to an early stage of technical development
= example: belonging to an early stage of technical development
= synonyms: primitive
- not refined or processed
= synonyms: unprocessed, unrefined
- not carefully or expertly made
= example: not carefully or expertly made
= synonyms: rough
- devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
= synonyms: stark, blunt
noun
- a dark oil consisting mainly of hydrocarbons
= synonyms: oil, petroleum, crude oil, rock oil, fossil oil
